verses.verse: The vision <WH2377> of Isaiah <WH3470> the son <WH1121> of Amoz, <WH531> which he saw <WH2372> concerning Judah <WH3063> and Jerusalem, <WH3389> in the days <WH3117> of Uzziah, <WH5818> Jotham, <WH3147> Ahaz, <WH271> and Hezekiah, <WH3169> kings <WH4428> of Judah. <WH3063>

Hear, <WH8085> heavens, <WH8064> and listen, <WH238> earth; <WH776> for Yahweh <WH3068> has spoken: <WH1696> "I have nourished <WH1431> and brought up <WH7311> children, <WH1121> and they have rebelled against me. <WH6586>
The ox <WH7794> knows <WH3045> his owner, <WH7069> and the donkey <WH2543> his master <WH1167>'s crib; <WH18> but Israel <WH3478> doesn't <WH3045> know, my people <WH5971> don't <WH995> consider."

Ah <WH1945> sinful <WH2398> nation, <WH1471> a people <WH5971> loaded <WH3515> with iniquity, <WH5771> a seed <WH2233> of evildoers, <WH7489> children <WH2233> who deal corruptly! <WH7843> They have forsaken <WH5800> Yahweh. <WH3068> They have despised <WH5006> the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel. <WH3478> They are estranged <WH2114> and backward. <WH268>
Why should you be beaten <WH5221> more, <WH5627> that you revolt more and more? <WH3254> The whole head <WH7218> is sick, <WH2483> and the whole heart <WH3824> faint. <WH1742>

From the sole <WH3709> of the foot <WH7272> even to the head <WH7218> there is no soundness <WH4974> in it: <WH6482> wounds, welts, <WH2250> and open <WH2961> sores. <WH4347> They haven't <WH2115> been closed, neither bandaged, <WH2280> neither soothed <WH7401> with oil. <WH8081>

Your country <WH776> is desolate. <WH8077> Your cities <WH5892> are burned <WH8313> with fire. <WH784> Strangers <WH2114> devour <WH398> your land <WH127> in your presence, <WH8077> and it is desolate, as overthrown <WH4114> by strangers. <WH2114>
The daughter <WH1323> of Zion <WH6726> is left <WH3498> like a shelter <WH5521> in a vineyard, <WH3754> like a hut <WH4412> in a field of melons, <WH4750> like a besieged <WH5341> city. <WH5892>

Unless <WH3884> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies <WH6635> had left <WH3498> to us a very small <WH4592> remnant, <WH8300> we would have been <WH1961> as Sodom; <WH5467> we would have been like <WH1819> Gomorrah. <WH6017>
Hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of Yahweh, <WH3068> you rulers <WH7101> of Sodom! <WH5467> Listen <WH238> to the law <WH8451> of our God, <WH430> you people <WH5971> of Gomorrah! <WH6017>

"What <WH4100> are the multitude <WH7230> of your sacrifices <WH2077> to me? <WH559>," says Yahweh. <WH3068> "I have had enough <WH7646> of the burnt offerings <WH5930> of rams, <WH352> and the fat <WH2459> of fed animals. <WH4806> I don't <WH2654> delight in the blood <WH1818> of bulls, <WH6499> or of lambs, <WH3532> or of male goats. <WH6260>
When you come <WH935> to appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> me, <WH1245> who has required this at your hand, <WH3027> to trample <WH7429> my courts? <WH2691>

Bring <WH935> no more <WH3254> vain <WH7723> offerings. <WH4503> Incense <WH7004> is an abomination <WH8441> to me; <WH2320> new moons, Sabbaths, <WH7676> and convocations: <WH4744> I can't <WH3201> bear with <WH3201> evil <WH205> assemblies. <WH4744>
My soul <WH5315> hates <WH8130> your New Moons <WH2320> and your appointed feasts. <WH4150> They are a burden <WH2960> to me. <WH3811> I am weary of bearing them. <WH5375>

When you spread forth <WH6566> your hands, <WH3709> I will hide <WH5956> my eyes <WH5869> from you. <WH7235> Yes, when you make many prayers, <WH8605> I will not hear. <WH8085> Your hands <WH3027> are full <WH4390> of blood. <WH1818>
Wash <WH7364> yourselves, <WH2135> make yourself clean. Put away <WH5493> the evil <WH7455> of your doings <WH4611> from before <WH5048> my eyes. <WH5869> Cease <WH2308> to do evil. <WH7489>
Learn <WH3925> to do well. <WH3190> Seek <WH1875> justice. <WH4941> Relieve <WH833> the oppressed. <WH2541> Judge <WH8199> the fatherless. <WH3490> Plead <WH7378> for the widow. <WH490>"

"Come now, <WH3212> and let us reason together, <WH3198>" says <WH559> Yahweh: <WH3068> "Though your sins <WH2399> be as scarlet, <WH8144> they shall be as white <WH3835> as snow. <WH7950> Though they be red <WH119> like crimson, <WH8438> they shall be as wool. <WH6785>
If you are willing <WH14> and obedient, <WH8085> you shall eat <WH398> the good <WH2898> of the land; <WH776>
but if you refuse <WH3985> and rebel, <WH4784> you shall be devoured <WH398> with the sword; <WH2719> for the mouth <WH6310> of Yahweh <WH3068> has spoken it. <WH1696>"
How the faithful <WH539> city <WH7151> has become a prostitute! <WH2181> She was full <WH4392> of justice; <WH4941> righteousness <WH6664> lodged <WH3885> in her, <WH7523> but now murderers.
Your silver <WH3701> has become dross, <WH5509> your wine <WH5435> mixed <WH4107> with water. <WH4325>

Your princes <WH8269> are rebellious, <WH5637> and companions <WH2270> of thieves. <WH1590> Everyone loves <WH157> bribes, <WH7810> and follows <WH7291> after rewards. <WH8021> They don't <WH8199> judge the fatherless, <WH3490> neither does the cause <WH7379> of the widow <WH490> come to them. <WH935>

Therefore the Lord, <WH113> Yahweh <WH113> of Armies, <WH6635> the Mighty One <WH46> of Israel, <WH3478> says: <WH5002> "Ah, <WH1945> I will get relief <WH5162> from my adversaries, <WH6862> and avenge <WH5358> myself of my enemies; <WH341>
and I will turn <WH7725> my hand <WH3027> on you, <WH1253> thoroughly purge away <WH6884> your dross, <WH5509> and will take away <WH5493> all your tin. <WH913>

I will restore <WH7725> your judges <WH8199> as at the first, <WH7223> and your counselors <WH3289> as at the beginning. <WH8462> Afterward <WH310> you shall be called <WH7121> <WH5892> 'The city of righteousness, <WH6664> a faithful <WH539> town. <WH7151>'
Zion <WH6726> shall be redeemed <WH6299> with justice, <WH4941> and her converts <WH7725> with righteousness. <WH6666>
But the destruction <WH7667> of transgressors <WH6586> and sinners <WH2400> shall be together, <WH3162> and those who forsake <WH5800> Yahweh <WH3068> shall be consumed. <WH3615>
For they shall be ashamed <WH954> of the oaks <WH352> which you have desired, <WH2530> and you shall be confounded <WH2659> for the gardens <WH1593> that you have chosen. <WH977>
For you shall be as an oak <WH424> whose leaf <WH5929> fades, <WH5034> and as a garden <WH1593> that has no water. <WH4325>
The strong <WH2634> will be like tinder, <WH5296> and his work <WH6467> like a spark. <WH5213> They will both <WH8147> burn <WH1197> together, <WH3162> and no one will quench them. <WH3518>"
